mapper.insert:
insert into plan_board (user_id, article_title, plan_no, register_time) values (#{userId}, #{articleTitle}, #{planNo}, #{registerTime})
select last_insert_id()
insert into file_info (article_no, save_folder, original_file, save_file) values (#{articleNo}, #{img.saveFolder}, #{img.originalFile}, #{img.saveFile})

insert into review (article_no, content_id, content) values
(#{articleNo}, #{review.contentId}, #{review.content})
mapper.select: select pb.article_no, m.user_nickname, pb.article_title, pb.article_hit, pb.bookmark_cnt, pb.register_time from plan_board pb join trip_member m on pb.user_id = m.user_id

select pb.article_no, m.user_nickname, pb.article_title, pb.article_hit, pb.bookmark_cnt, pb.register_time from plan_board pb join trip_member m on pb.user_id = m.user_id where pb.article_title like concat('%', #{word}, '%')

select pb.article_no, m.user_nickname, pb.article_title, pb.article_hit, pb.bookmark_cnt, pb.register_time from plan_board pb join trip_member m on pb.user_id = m.user_id where pb.article_no = #{articleNo}

select pb.article_no, s.plan_date, s.plan_seq, s.content_id, r.content from plan_board pb join plan_seq s on pb.plan_no = s.plan_no join review r on pb.article_no = r.article_no and s.content_id = r.content_id where pb.article_no = #{articleNo} order by s.plan_date, s.plan_seq
